column2: EMCORE Corp. engages in the manufacture and provision of mixed-signal optics products. The company is headquartered in Alhambra, California and currently employs 420 full-time employees. The firm focuses on linear fiber optic transmission technology. The firm operates through Fiber Optics segment. The firm provides optical components, and also end-to-end solutions for high-speed communications network infrastructures. The firm's optical technologies are designed for cable television (CATV) and fiber-to-the-premise (FTTP) networks, telecommunications and data centers, satellite communications, aerospace and defense, wireless networks, and broadcast and professional audio/video systems. The firm's fiber optics products enable information that is modulated on light signals to be transmitted, routed (switched) and received in communication systems and networks.
